description: From Latin caementitius (“pertaining to quarry stones”). See cement.

adjectives.description: cementitious (comparative more cementitious, superlative most cementitious)

entries.meaning: Resembling or having some properties of cement.
examples: This decomposition is owing to the action of the atmosphere , sun , and rain , that alters the cementitious or stiff matter in the different earthy particles . The cementitious matter is chiefly sulphureous or aluminous
